creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque made from several flat pieces of silver- these pieces are tied together with silver wire; 14 large wire cones run along the edges; at the center bottom, one large curlicue dangles down; three cones with a small sphere in the center decorate the center of the torque; connecting piece has three small cones decorating it
title: Torque
